plot: A strong-willed young woman hires a student to impersonate a boorish French count and brings him home to meet her parents.
title: Walking on Air
plot_es: A strong-willed young woman hires a student to impersonate a boorish French count and brings him home to meet her parents.
plot_en: A strong-willed young woman hires a student to impersonate a boorish French count and brings him home to meet her parents.

cast.role: Pete Quinlan, aka Count Pierre Louis de Marsac
cast.name: Gene Raymond
